translations: n.电信，电讯（telecommunications 的缩略形式）；电信业；电信公司；电信学；通过电信发送的信息

sentences.sentence: The entire telecom sector has been suffering from a lack of sales.
sentences.translation: 整个电信部门一直在经受销售不景气之苦。

sentences.sentence: Northern Telecom says its products will roll out over 18 months beginning early next year.
sentences.translation: 北方电讯公司表示其产品将从明年初起用18个多月的时间推出。

sentences.sentence: TI has seen its shares suffer because of a flight of capital to telecom and Internet-related businesses.
sentences.translation: 德州仪器的股票因为资金流向电信和因特网相关企业而遭受损失。
